title: Dear Friends (2U98)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Fellowship: Exert a companion to place a Free Peoples card from your discard pile beneath your draw deck (or 2 Free Peoples cards if that companion has the Frodo signet).
Lore:	“He pressed him for news of himself and of the wide world… and they stayed up far into the night.”
Rarity:	U
